# Advent of Code: Day 1 

## Part 1
```{r}
getwd()
setwd("/home/lujza/adventofcode2020/day1")

input <- scan("input.txt", quiet = TRUE)

pairs <- combn(input, 2)

sums <- colSums(pairs)

pos <- match(2020, sums)

print(cumprod(pairs[,pos]))

```
